Name: Pixel Palette Creator
About the game: Create palettes in seconds through ramps and functions The scaled up output of this gif when i clicked save (normally one color is one pixel, but also exports bigger versions like this) If your unsure where to start, try selecting a preset If your feeling inspired by the colors of a game your currently playing, simply snip tool and drag n drop to generate that games palette as a base to work from Example game is Eternower by Rokas (very fun and challenging minimalist tower defence) / If you find it useful, consider leaving a tip, id like to keep making more things like this, but the fees add up :) /
